  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Shipment Coordinator I",
  "description": "Nautilus Nigeria Engineering and Construction Limited (NNEC)&#39;s mission is to provide all clients with high quality, cost-effective, on-schedule engineering, project management, inspection and environmental services. NNEC is committed to design and build more efficient, safer, reliable, and environmentally friendly facilities for the betterment of our clients and their communities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Shipment Coordinator I

Job Locations:&nbsp;Akwa Ibom, Cross River, Lagos and Rivers

Main Functions


	Responsible for the logistics related to processing of customer orders. Coordinates with sales staff, dispatchers, customer service representatives, warehouse staff and shipping/receiving.
	Answers inquiries from customers and investigates complaints regarding services and policies. Input, update and consolidate ETA/shipping data and send to appropriate business units.
	Analyzes load information from customers in order to determine and verify the appropriate routes, rates, and schedules. Coordinates shipment schedules with vendors.
	Position will receive direction and support.
	This position level would typically include junior Logistics Coordinators performing mostly tasks that do not require prior extensive experience.


Skills and Qualifications


	Attention to detail. Strong organizational skills. Problem solving. Customer service.
	Strong communication skills as this position will be contact point for government officer.
	Familiarity/Proficiency with computer systems. Logical thinking skills for logistics optimization and improvement to the work process.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;infonnec1@nnecltd.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;the Job Position&nbsp;as the subject of the email.",

Shipment Coordinator I Job at Nautilus Nigeria Engineering and Construction Limited




        
    

        
        Nautilus Nigeria Engineering and Construction Limited (NNEC)'s mission is to provide all clients with high quality, cost-effective, on-schedule engineering, project management, inspection and environmental services. NNEC is committed to design and build more efficient, safer, reliable, and environmentally friendly facilities for the betterment of our clients and their communities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Shipment Coordinator I

Job Locations: Akwa Ibom, Cross River, Lagos and Rivers

Main Functions
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Responsible for the logistics related to processing of customer orders. Coordinates with sales staff, dispatchers, customer service representatives, warehouse staff and shipping/receiving.
	Answers inquiries from customers and investigates complaints regarding services and policies. Input, update and consolidate ETA/shipping data and send to appropriate business units.
	Analyzes load information from customers in order to determine and verify the appropriate routes, rates, and schedules. Coordinates shipment schedules with vendors.
	Position will receive direction and support.
	This position level would typically include junior Logistics Coordinators performing mostly tasks that do not require prior extensive experience.


Skills and Qualifications


	Attention to detail. Strong organizational skills. Problem solving. Customer service.
	Strong communication skills as this position will be contact point for government officer.
	Familiarity/Proficiency with computer systems. Logical thinking skills for logistics optimization and improvement to the work process.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: infonnec1@nnecltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
